required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Extract of Gelidium Elegans
clinical_study.official_title: Double Blind, Randomized Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Extract of Gelidium Elegans

brief_summary.textblock: Extract of Gelidium elegans inhibits lipid differentiation, accumulation, and synthesis in vitro and in vivo. It has also anti-obesity effect by inhibiting weight gain and decreasing body fat. In a preliminary study of obese adults aged 20 years or older, the extracts of Gelidium elegans showed a tendency to decrease in body fat and visceral fat, and to increase lean body mass. Based on these results, we tried to confirm the effect of body weight and body fat reduction of Gelidium elegans extract in overweight and obese people.

primary_outcome.measure: change in body fat mass by DEXA after 12-week treatment
change in visceral, subcutaneous, total fat area and ratio of visceral and subcutaneous fat area will be combined to report by Fat CT after 12-week treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: change in body weight and body fat mass will be combined to report by Bio-impedance
change in body weight and body fat mass will be combined to report by Bio-impedance
change in waist circumference
change in waist circumference
change in hip circumference
change in hip circumference
change in ratio of waist and hip circumference
change in ratio of waist and hip circumference
body mass index
body mass index
change in lean body mass by DEXA
change in lean body mass by DEXA
change in laboratory test result of total cholesterol, HDL, LDL and triglyceride will be combined to report as lipid profile
change in laboratory test result of total cholesterol, HDL, LDL and triglyceride will be combined to report as lipid profile
change in laboratory test result of CRP
change in laboratory test result of CRP
change in laboratory test result of fasting insulin
change in laboratory test result of fasting insulin
change in HOMA-IR
change in HOMA-IR
change in HOMA-beta
change in HOMA-beta

arm_group.description: taken 3 tablets of Gelidium elegans extract (1000 mg/day) once a day for 12 weeks
taken 3 tablets of placebo once a day for 12 weeks

intervention.description: Exract of Gelidium elegans will be given to the test group.
Placebo supplement will be given to the test group.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 1. Between the ages of 19 and 50
- 2. BMI is at or greater than 23 and less than 30 kg/m^2
Exclusion Criteria:
- 1. uncontrolled hypertension
- 2. uncontrolled diabetes
- 3. current serious cerebrovascular and cardiovascular disease

facility.name: Department of Family Medicine, Severance Hospital, College of Medicine, Yonsei University
